price: So leave them alone until they encounter their Day in which they will be struck down[16],
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ
footnotes: [16] i.e., they will be punished on the Day of Judgment.
